title: To: Gmail Spam filter, Merry Christmas! From: Worm.Zafi.D
body: <p>Thanks to whoever the a-hole is that got the Merry Christmas worm that spoofed my gmail address as the sender. I really enjoyed 12:35pm to 2:43pm when I received 560 bounce messages.  Look at the screenshot below, and check out the times at the right and the number of threaded messages in parentheses:</p><p><a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/images/28/o_Merry_Christmas_gmail.png" title="look at my gmail's spam folder, ridiculous"><img src="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/images/28/t_Merry_Christmas_gmail.png" alt="thumb of my gmail spam folder" /></a></p><p><a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/MSNvsGoogle.html?sourceid=Mozilla-search&amp;q=%22Merry+Christmas%21%22+Zafi" title="more on Zafi">more on Zafi</a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-12-15

To: Gmail Spam filter, Merry Christmas! From: Worm.Zafi.D

Thanks to whoever the a-hole is that got the Merry Christmas worm that spoofed my gmail address as the sender. I really enjoyed 12:35pm to 2:43pm when I received 560 bounce messages. Look at the screenshot below, and check out the times at the right and the number of threaded messages in parentheses:
